name: Leg-Up
description:
Leg Up -  made for Weekly Game Jam #151 

Theme: Olympics

play as a pair of legs And hop over hurdles to the finish! 

I entered the jam a little late so I  made this in 3 days. I've tweaked the difficulty slightly after release but it's a difficult game by nature. I recommend the windows download over the WebGL if possible. tutorial doesn't exit correctly in WebGL.
